description: Successfully optimised clients B2B SaaS solutions using modern Angular 19+, NestJS and improve overall performance.

Successfully optimised their B2B SaaS offering, migrating to modern Angular 16+, SSR Angular Universal, NodeJS, and Nx to streamline operations, enhance user experience, and improve overall performance. Restructured and migrated a large monolithic codebase into smaller, self-contained modules, enhancing adaptability and resilience.

Produced key upgrades to the Middle East and North Africas foreign exchange trading platform, led the migration for improved reliability, enhanced a Front-Office trading platform to boost trading efficiency in CFD, Forex, and cryptocurrency markets, and efficiently managed development teams for swift project delivery and enhanced team efficiency.

Produced a Micro-Frontends financial cryptowallet solution to make it simple to trade cryptocurrency, following a set of policies, procedures, and technologies to prevent financial crime from Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorist Financing

Implemented Atomic Design and in a Mobile-First SaaS solution enhancing maintainability, scalability, and user experience; developed API endpoints for efficient data retrieval; and optimised Reactive Components to boost system performance and increase the KYC rate.
